title: Single Of The Week: Groundislava – Panorama (feat. Jake Weary)
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/groundislavasingle.jpg "groundislavasingle")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7919-single-of-the-week-groundiuslava-panorama-feat-jake-weary/attachment/groundislavasingle/)

The first time we brought you news about [**Groundislava**](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Groundislava/171251306240214) they had just released their debit video for the rather haunting tune _Animal_. With the LP now released **Groundislava’s** full potential has been realised. Taking influences from hip-hop, 8bit beats and dubstep; the music has a foot firmly in popular culture while still reaching for new worlds and sounds. It’s almost like a hi-fi soundtrack to an 80’s video game that was never released. It’s a sound that drips with nostalgia while hopefully looks forward. One of the LP’s highlights, **Panorama**, also features the fantastic **Jake Weary** and also happens to be our single of the week. Enjoy the next 6 days of your life.

 [Ground Is Lava – Panorama (ft. Jake Weary)](http://soundcloud.com/warszawarecords/ground-is-lava-panorama-ft) by [warszawarecords](http://soundcloud.com/warszawarecords)
